name: Overflow (WGJ 157)
description:
Strike your enemies by bumping or dashing onto them and deal damage to both yourself and your target!

But one may wonder... "How is it possible to survive with this?" You can survive any amount of damage as long as your health doesn't reach exactly zero.

That's right, your health can be negative! That being said, damage you take while your health is negative will increase it instead... Just remember to not hit zero!

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam (Week 157) with the theme "Vulnerable Invincible".

Controls

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Dash attack. Hold to charge it to deal more damage!

Credits

  • EndMark_3 - Code, visuals
  • BlazingScore004- Code, music
